channel.title: [Crash] At the start of a new game
channel.description: The game crashes after starting a new game, few seconds after showing the "black mesa" text for a few moments sound gliches 2-3 times and game crashes. I've tried different graphics setting but no success. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T5_52_13C0.mdmp (135 KB)

item.title: [Crash] At the start of a new game
item.dc:creator: Mr.Yarr
item.description:
The game crashes after starting a new game, few seconds after showing the “black mesa” text for a few moments sound gliches 2-3 times and game crashes.
I’ve tried different graphics setting but no success.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T5_52_13C0.mdmp (135 KB)

Read full topic
item.source: [Crash] At the start of a new game
